function.name: save_to_csv
function.description: Saves given data to a CSV file in the outputs directory. Accepts either a plain list of strings or an object with a 'data' key containing a list of strings.

data.description: List of strings to save. If an object with a 'data' key is passed, the 'data' key is used.

file_name.description: Name of the CSV file to save the data to.
